data.title: Little Alchemy cheats: Full list of combinations, recipes and elements
data.meta_description: Been playing Little Alchemy and want to make some more items? Here are the Little Alchemy cheats to make absolutely anything you like in the game.
data.text:
If you need some Little Alchemy cheats to help create more of the combinations available, we've broken down every single Little Alchemy recipe and element to help you out.

Advertisement

As with Little Alchemy 2, the sequel to the original, creating every single element in Little Alchemy is quite a challenge, even with these hints, as you will need to make sure you have the available elements for each combination beforehand.

Read more: Infinite Craft recipes

Here's the full breakdown of Little Alchemy cheats and hints.

Little Alchemy cheats: Full list of combinations, recipes and elements
